preqs: Two of the following units APG4698, APG4346, APG4020, APG4735, APG5046, APG5042, APG5047, APG5043.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {APG4020, APG4346, APG4698, APG4735, APG5042, APG5043, APG5046, APG5047}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

description: The course will address key concepts, theoretical models, accepted approaches and contested frameworks and theories in the rapidly changing field of second language acquisition. Topics covered include models and theories of second language acquisition, first and second language acquisition, error analysis and interlanguage, interlanguage pragmatics, input and interaction, learner strategies, learning styles, cognitive processes, second language identity, learners' rights and methods in SLA research.
